```{r}
library(NLP)
library(tm)
library(wordcloud)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(dplyr)
library(plyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
InauguationDates <- read.table("InauguationDates.txt", sep="\t",fill=TRUE, header = TRUE)
InaugurationInfo <- read.csv("InaugurationInfo.csv", fill=TRUE, header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
InauguationDates
InaugurationInfo[, 5]  <- suppressWarnings(as.numeric(InaugurationInfo[, 5]))
InaugurationInfo
PartyWords <- ddply(InaugurationInfo, .(Party), summarize, Words = mean(Words, na.rm = TRUE))
TermWords <- ddply(InaugurationInfo, .(Term), summarize, Words = mean(Words, na.rm = TRUE))
PartyWords
TermWords
```

```{r}
Democratic <- filter(InaugurationInfo, Party == "Democratic")
Democratic$President[Democratic$President == "Grover Cleveland - II"] <- "Grover Cleveland"
Democratic$President[Democratic$President == "Grover Cleveland - I"] <- "Grover Cleveland"
Democratic$President[Democratic$Term == 2] <- paste(Democratic$President[Democratic$Term == 2], "- II", sep = "")
Democratic$President[Democratic$Term == 3] <- paste(Democratic$President[Democratic$Term == 3], "- III", sep = "")
Democratic$President[Democratic$Term == 4] <- paste(Democratic$President[Democratic$Term == 3], "- IV", sep = "")
Democratic
ggplot(data = Democratic, aes(x = reorder(President, -Words), y = Words, fill = Words > mean(Words))) + geom_bar(stat = "identity") + geom_hline(aes(yintercept = mean(Words))) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) + scale_fill_brewer() 

```
